Kelly Kaufman : Software Developer

Portfolio + Experience

Infinite Loop

X

Infinite Loop

For my capstone, I built an anxiety app that allows users to specify, track, and implement coping skills for their anxiety. I built the app using a Rails backend, a Vue.js frontend, and a PostgresSQL database to store user logs.

Client: Actualize Coding Bootcamp
Category: Fullstack Web App

Student Portal

X

Student Portal

While at Actualize, I led a team of students to create a student portal. The site enabled students to login, and update their profiles and resumes. This front-end app utilized a Rails API, which was created by another team in my cohort.

Client: Actualize Coding Bootcamp
Category: Front-end Web App

Faux Comm

During my time at Bitwise Industries, a workforce training program, I created a React e-commerce app that allows users to browse, filter, and select clothing pieces.

Client: Bitwise Industries
Category: Front-end Web App

Club Soda

During my time at the Club Soda startup, I contributed to building their store using React, which will allow users to browse and purchase merchandise. Unfortunately, due to the confidentiality of the project I am unable to share it.

Client: Club Soda

My Story

I've always had an interest in tech but when it came to choosing my path, I thought it was a field only for math geniuses, so I chose hospitality. When I lost my job due to COVID-19, I needed to find a new career.

Through my research, I learned that you don't have to be a math genius to be a Software Engineer— and shortly after that I enrolled in Actualize Coding Bootcamp. I learned the fundamentals of fullstack web development, and thoroughly enjoyed collaborating with others and problem-solving.

Since graduating, I've been gaining professional experience through working part-time at a startup. I continue to learn and develop my skills through independent projects, and I am currently rebuilding my capstone in React.

Goals

Use tech to improve:
  • Mental Health
  • Learning
  • Productivity
Help others embarking on the Software Engineering career path.
